basics.name: Aviation Executive Officer
basics.label: Seasoned leader
basics.summary: Seasoned leader who possesses effective decision making, analytical, organizational, communication, and problem solving skills. A strong background in cross-functional team leadership, with extensive experience leading and coaching a very diverse group of employees.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Second in command over a 42 personnel United States Army Air Ambulance Detachment, assuming responsibilities of detachment commanding officer in supervisor's absence.
highlights: Received an average 15% higher evaluation rating from the previous Aviation Resource Management inspection

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Led, trained, and mentored 24 Soldiers; developed specific combat readiness-based training for deployment in support of Operation Enduring Freedom
highlights: Planned the detailed logistics coordination between two facilities over 1,750 miles apart
Chosen out of 27 Captains to serve as a remote outpost Base OperationsSupport Integrator

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Led, trained, and mentored 57 Soldiers of a multi-functional Aviation Unit Maintenance Company (AVUM) on the safe operation of all aviation ground support equipment and aviation specific tools.
highlights: Supervised scheduled maintenance and conducted comprehensive Phase Maintenance Inspections (PMI) for 11 x UH-60A/L Blackhawks and 11 x CH-47F Chinooks
Balanced thousands of man hours of unscheduled maintenance while conducting PMI inspections
